metadata.feature_description: Manage post states through draft, review, and publish workflow stages

steps.action: Navigate to News page where Publisher module is installed
steps.expected: Publisher module displays with Unpublished Posts section
steps.actual: Publisher module displayed with Unpublished Posts table showing 3 posts

steps.expected: Table shows Name, Date created, Author, and Actions columns
steps.actual: Table displayed with columns: Name, Date created, Author, Actions. 3 posts visible: Test Post for Social Media Sharing, Test Post for Author Management, Test Blog Post for Publisher Feature

steps.expected: Create Post form opens with title, content editor, and workflow action buttons
steps.actual: Create Post form displayed with image upload area, title input, content editor, and action buttons (Submit, Discard, Save)

steps.action: Enter title and content for new post
steps.expected: Title and content fields accept input
steps.actual: Title 'Workflow Test Post - Draft Submission' entered, content typed successfully in rich text editor

steps.action: Click Save button with Direct Publish workflow configured
steps.expected: System should prevent saving draft when workflow does not support draft state
steps.actual: Error dialog displayed: 'The current post cannot be saved since it has an incompatible state. Please, refresh the page.' This is correct behavior as Direct Publish workflow has only 1 state and does not support draft saving.

steps.action: View Publisher Settings panel and workflow dropdown
steps.expected: Workflow dropdown shows available workflow options
steps.actual: Publisher Settings panel displayed with workflow dropdown showing options: Direct Publish (default), Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Approval Workflow, QA Test Workflow, and other custom workflows

steps.action: Change workflow selection to Save Draft
steps.expected: Workflow dropdown allows selection of different workflows
steps.actual: Save Draft workflow selected successfully in the dropdown

steps.action: Attempt to save post without story content
steps.expected: Validation error should appear indicating story text is required
steps.actual: Dialog appeared: 'The text of the story is required' - validation correctly prevents saving empty posts

observations: Publisher module is installed on the News page with workflow functionality enabled
The Publisher Settings panel allows configuration of workflow type, with options including Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, and custom workflows
Direct Publish workflow (1 state) correctly prevents draft saving as expected from code review of PublishingManager.cs
Save Draft workflow (2 states) should allow saving drafts before publishing
Content Approval workflow enables multi-step review process with submit, approve, reject, and publish actions
The Create Post interface includes rich text editor with formatting toolbar (bold, italic, underline, lists, links, images, HTML)
Post validation requires both title and story content before saving
Code review confirmed workflow state management in PublishingManager.cs with methods: SaveDraft, Submit, Publish, Reject, Discard
Persona bar overlay occasionally intercepts click events on Publisher Settings panel buttons - a potential UI/UX issue to investigate
Existing unpublished posts are visible and manageable from the Unpublished Posts table
